items.sentence: I don\'t think many people can say they are satisfied with their salary.
I like to put an ice cube into my coffee, because it\'s usually too hot.
I think it\'s strange that no one is on the street this time of the day.
I thought it\'d be great if we could get Tom to play a few songs for us.
There\'s no point talking to you, because you won\'t do as I say anyway.
